snippet.title: Airtone PlayMovie【Breeze】
snippet.description:
Designed for the HTC Vive and Oculus Rift with Unreal Engine 4, this Air Rhythm Action game offers a whole new musical sensation.

In the game you meet Neon, who was left behind on Mars. You play as her android partner and collect "Rhythm".

Follow: https://twitter.com/Airtone_VR
Visit us at: http://airtone-vr.com/
Email: inquiry@airtone-vr.com

HTC Vive/Oculus Rift対応、Unreal Engine 4を採用した新感覚の「エアーリズムアクション」です。プレイヤーは相棒のロボットとなって、リズムを集めることになります。

Oculus Store
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/rift/1405726876106579/
Steam
http://store.steampowered.com/app/631900/Airtone/
